meanings.sent1: The herbivorous rabbit nibbled on the green lettuce.
meanings.sent2: Deer are herbivorous animals that eat leaves and grass.
meanings.sent3: The herbivorous caterpillar threw a tiny plant-based party.
meanings.sent4: The herbivorous sheep painted the meadow with its grazing.
meanings.sent5: The herbivorous giraffe stood tall, munching on leaves from the tree.

meanings.definition: An animal that feeds on plants
meanings.sent1: The herbivorous in the zoo enjoyed a buffet of fresh vegetables.
meanings.sent2: A cow is a herbivorous that mainly eats grass.
meanings.sent3: The herbivorous at the party only wanted to eat the salad.
meanings.sent4: The herbivorous of the forest were like leafy lawnmowers.
meanings.sent5: The herbivorous horse galloped happily through the field, grazing on the greenery.
